INSTRUCTIONS: In this task, you must determine whether a sequence of letters is or is not a word.  On each trial, a sequence of letters will appear on the screen.  For example, BUILD.  If the sequence of letters forms a common english word, respond using the LEFT shift key.  On other trials, you will see a sequence of letters that is not a word, such as BUILF.  When the sequence is not a common English word, respond with the right shift key. Press any key to begin.
